content: now you can crochet the beautiful **cosmos blouse** 1 that is nice and airy - perfect for a hot summer day it is crocheted in universe which is available in the most gorgeous colorways universe is spun with a glitter thread which gives the blouse that little something extra enjoy **sizes ** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl **skill level ** beginner **crochet hook ** 4 00 mm us size g **materials ** stitch markers sewing needle for weaving in the ends scissors **gauge ** 6 v sts = 10 cm 10 row in v st = 10 cm **yarn ** universe in color supercluster #05 **how much yarn do you need ** xs s 2 skeins m l 3 skeins xl 4 skeins 2xl 3xl 4xl 5 skeins **abbreviations used in this pattern ** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet v st - v_stitch 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in the same st chain space - chain space st s - stitch es * repeat section r| - row/round 1 https //hobbii com/cosmos-blouse utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=cosmos-blouse+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
